entry.title: My super title
entry.content:
This is the content of my super blog post.## Building a Database of Price Paid Data for UK Properties on Amazon Web Services

This post describes how a database of the prices paid for UK property can be created on Amazon Web Services.

This post is the first in a series of 3 posts.

Creating remote machine on Amazon Web Services (AWS)

If you haven't got one already you will need to register for a new account with Amazon Web Services.
